Package com.taco.suit_lady.util.tools

Class BindingTools

java.lang.Object
com.taco.suit_lady.util.tools.BindingsSL
public class BindingTools extends Object
Utility methods related to Properties and Bindings.

    static class 
    BindingTools.RecursiveBinding<U,​V>
    Allows you to bind an ObservableValue to a dynamic Binding.

    • createBooleanBinding

      @NotNull public static @NotNull javafx.beans.binding.BooleanBinding createBooleanBinding​(javafx.beans.value.ObservableBooleanValue observable)

      Constructs a new BooleanBinding that always reflects the value of the specified ObservableBooleanValue.

      Details

      1. If the specified value is null, the returned binding always returns false.
      Parameters:
      observable - The ObservableBooleanValue to be reflected by the returned BooleanBinding.
      Returns:
      A new BooleanBinding that always reflects the value of the specified value.

      Details

    • createNullCheckBinding

      public static javafx.beans.binding.BooleanBinding createNullCheckBinding​(javafx.beans.binding.Binding<?> binding)
      Creates a BooleanBinding that is bound to the null status of the specified Binding.
      Parameters:
      binding - The Binding who's value is to be null-checked.
      Returns:
      The newly created BooleanBinding bound to the null status of the specified Binding.

    • incrementingBinding

      Creates and then returns an IntegerBinding that increments by 1 every time any of the specified Observables is updated.
      Parameters:
      obs - The Observables.
      Returns:
      An IntegerBinding that increments by 1 every time any of the specified Observables is updated.

    • bindFX

      public static <T> void bindFX​(javafx.beans.property.Property<T> property, javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<T> observableValue, Lock lock)
      Binds the specified Property to the specified ObservableValue, ensuring that the update process is done on the FX thread.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of Object wrapped by the specified values.
      Parameters:
      property - The Property being bound.
      observableValue - The ObservableValue the specified Property is being bound to.
